General.Name: MegaStudyEdu Co. Ltd
General.Description: MegaStudyEdu Co. Ltd. provides online and offline educational services in South Korea. It engages in the online education academy, provision of education information, entrance examination consulting, offline school direct management businesses, etc. The company provides its services to elementary, middle, and high school students. MegaStudyEdu Co. Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
